urls.title: Travel during COVID
urls.description: Travel requirements are subject to change at short notice by the issuing government authority. As such, posting of the advisories below is not real-time and serve only as a guide. Please confirm your requirements directly with the offices/websites of your place of origin and destination. All passengers are encouraged to follow the guide, register in advance and pre-book their hotels as necessary to avoid any inconvenience and experience faster processing upon arrival. Per PAL’s Conditions of Carriage,

data.text: @jeverrly Hi, Jeverly! Yes, it's still possible :) Allow us to look into your booking. We'll send you a DM.
@0xJab Hello, Hermit_frog. We are sorry to hear this. We have sent you a DM. Thank you!
@roweldelrosaryo Hello, Roel. We have sent you a DM so we can assist you further. Thank you.
@jaypeeceebee Hi, Jhonpaul! We're sorry to hear about this. Allow us to assist you on your booking, please check our DM for us to proceed.
@ful_mrc Hello, Gab. Our system does not accept special characters such as ñ. In the itinerary, ñ will reflect as n. Thank you for understanding.
@RanHeartShin Hello, R B. We are sorry to hear this. Let us help you with your concern by responding to our DM. Thank you!

data.text: @maginoongtunay Hi, maginoo. This informs you that for book and hold transactions, the itinerary receipt/e-ticket is sent within 48 hours after payment has been posted. Please expect to receive this through email, with the email address registered in your booking. Thank you.
